sentences.english: And now it seems to me the beautiful uncut hair of graves.
sentences.chinese: 现在它对于我更像是美丽而缺少修剪的墓地上的发丝。

sentences.english: Someday I will watch you brushing your child's hair.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我会看见你坐在床沿，梳理孩子柔细的发丝。

sentences.english: I know an inory-faced and silvery-haired man is unlikely an angel.
sentences.chinese: 我知道有着玉色脸孔银白发丝的男人并不一定是天使。

sentences.english: People were clapping and cheering and catching the locks of hair.
sentences.chinese: 人们在鼓掌，欢呼，去接住被剪断的发丝。

sentences.english: Section on the top front area, over direct all the section to golden point, station guide line.
sentences.chinese: 在顶部前区的发丝都提拉到黄金点，固定色际线。

sentences.english: Remove dandruff, adsorb sebum and dirt, and make hair refreshing and manageable.
sentences.chinese: 清理皮屑，吸附皮脂及厚积污垢，令发丝清爽柔顺。

sentences.english: Paper defect where there is a hair-like indentation in a coated surface running in grain direction.
sentences.chinese: 顺着纸纹方向，纸面的涂层有着像头发丝的凹痕故障。

sentences.english: It’s not enough to just draw a hair and be done with it.
sentences.chinese: 而且也不仅仅是画出一根发丝就完事了那么简单的。

sentences.english: It's one-twentieth the thickness of a human hair.
sentences.chinese: 它相当于人头发丝的二十分之一那样细。

sentences.english: Just listen to the audio sensation that monster I had white hair turned black immediately.
sentences.chinese: 只听轰的声那妖怪原本白色我发丝立即变成了黑色。

sentences.english: Your bloodstained hair sears me in a sea of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 你被血所沾污的发丝灼烧我在一片蛇的海洋。

sentences.english: They like to run their fingers through heavy tresses.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢将手指穿进厚实的发丝。

sentences.english: Natural bamboo extract, hair nourishing, recuperate repair hair.
sentences.chinese: 天然竹提取物调理发丝润泽度，修护发质。

sentences.english: Perhaps the dream has to bear that Zhu Lei, but it has long been in the hair between the condensation.
sentences.chinese: 也许梦里有滑落的珠泪，但是早已于发丝间凝结。

sentences.english: After cleansing hair, take proper amount of this product to the clean and moisturizing hair. Don't must wash out.
sentences.chinese: 洗发后，取适量涂抹于洁净湿润的发丝上，勿须过水。

sentences.english: We can actually pull Rodney 's hairline down a bit.
sentences.chinese: 我们实际上能够把罗得尼的发丝向下拉一点。
